languages.text: "Арджента права. Мы объявим народу о внутреннем враге. Пусть помогут нашим блюстителям, что пойдут в атаку во всей силе".
"Argenta is right. We will announce to the people that we have an enemy in our midst. They should come to the aid of the enforcers who will be attacking in full force."
languages.original_text: "Арджента права. Мы объявим народу о внутреннем враге. Пусть помогут нашим блюстителям, что пойдут в атаку во всей силе".

traits.locale_text: "Argenta is right. We will announce an internal enemy to the people. They should help the enforcers who will be using their full strength to attack."
"Argenta is right. We will announce an internal enemy to the people. They should help the enforcers who will be using their full strength to attack."
"Argenta is right. We will announce an internal enemy to the people. They should come to the aid of the enforcers who will be attacking in full force."
"Argenta is right. We will announce an internal enemy to the people. They should come to the aid of the enforcers who will be attacking in full force."
"Argenta is right. We will announce to the people that we have an enemy in our midst. They should come to the aid of the enforcers who will be attacking in full force."
"Argenta is right. We will announce to the people that we have an enemy in our midst. They should come to the aid of the enforcers who will be attacking in full force."

languages.text: “阿洁塔说得没错，我们要向所有人宣布：我们之中潜藏着内奸。人们会帮助执法者全力打击那些叛徒。”
languages.original_text: "Argenta is right. We will announce to the people that we have an enemy in our midst. They should come to the aid of the enforcers who will be attacking in full force."

traits.locale_text: “阿洁塔说得没错，我们要向所有人宣布：我们之中潜藏着内奸。人们会帮助执法者全力打击那些叛徒。”

languages.text: «Argenta tiene razón. Anunciaremos al pueblo que el enemigo está entre nosotros. Deberían acudir en ayuda del personal de seguridad, que atacará con todas sus fuerzas».
languages.original_text: "Argenta is right. We will announce to the people that we have an enemy in our midst. They should come to the aid of the enforcers who will be attacking in full force."

traits.locale_text: «Argenta tiene razón. Anunciaremos al pueblo que el enemigo está entre nosotros. Deberían acudir en ayuda del personal de seguridad, que atacará con todas sus fuerzas».

languages.text: 「アルジェンタの言う通りだ。民に内部に潜む敵を公表する。奴らは、全力で攻撃してくるエンフォーサーを助けに来るはずだ」
languages.original_text: "Argenta is right. We will announce to the people that we have an enemy in our midst. They should come to the aid of the enforcers who will be attacking in full force."

traits.locale_text: 「アルジェンタの言う通りだ。民に内部に潜む敵を公表する。奴らは、全力で攻撃してくるエンフォーサーを助けに来るはずだ」
「アルジェンタの言う通りだ。民に内部に潜む敵を公表する。奴らは、全力で攻撃してくるエンフォーサーを助けに来るはずだ」

languages.text: « Argenta a raison... Nous allons avertir la population de la présence d'un ennemi infiltré, ça devrait nous garantir l'aide des prévôts pour étouffer cette menace dans l'œuf. »
languages.original_text: "Argenta is right. We will announce to the people that we have an enemy in our midst. They should come to the aid of the enforcers who will be attacking in full force."

traits.locale_text: « Argenta a raison... Nous allons avertir la population de la présence d'un ennemi infiltré, ça devrait nous garantir l'aide des prévôts pour étouffer cette menace dans l'œuf. »

languages.text: "Argenta hat recht. Wir werden den Leuten sagen, dass wir einen Feind in unserer Mitte haben. Sie sollen den Enforcern zur Hilfe kommen, die mit voller Kraft angreifen."
languages.original_text: "Argenta is right. We will announce to the people that we have an enemy in our midst. They should come to the aid of the enforcers who will be attacking in full force."

traits.locale_text: "Argenta hat recht. Wir werden den Leuten sagen, dass wir einen Feind in unserer Mitte haben. Sie sollen den Enforcern zur Hilfe kommen, die mit voller Kraft angreifen."
"Argenta hat recht. Wir präsentieren den Leuten einen internen Feind. Sie sollten den Enforcers zur Hilfe kommen, die mit voller Kraft angreifen."

languages.text: "Argenta haklı. Halkımıza aramızda düşmanların mevcut olduğunu duyuracağız. Muhakkak ki tüm kuvvetleriyle saldıracak infazcıların yardımına koşacaklardır."
languages.original_text: "Argenta is right. We will announce to the people that we have an enemy in our midst. They should come to the aid of the enforcers who will be attacking in full force."
